Professional Work Experience


  • StoneX Manhattan, NY

    • Quant Developer Intern, Fixed Income desk

    • Optum Hyderabad, IND

      • Associate Software Developer

      • Led a team of 6 members for a Machine Learning initiative aimed to increase efficiency of detecting fraudulent claims; achieved final accuracy score 85%.
      • Developed a full stack application using Java, MVC, Drools, React and MySQL to classify insurance claims in 3 groups.
      • Collaborated and interfaced with 5+ delivery teams to ensure timely release of more than 10 services estimated to provide millions of dollars in medical cost savings.

      • Slice Bangalore, IND

        • Data Science Intern, Credit Risk team

        • Automated categorization of incoming emails by developing a ML based multi-classification model in python utilizing Natural Language Processing; achieved a final f1-score of 88%.
        • Leveraged data (million+ datapoints) using SQL; reduced first reply time for user from 30 minutes to near real time (<5 sec).
        • Performed sentiment analysis on Google PlayStore reviews of Slice application to monitor overall response of customers.
